title: Work of the heart
creator_credit: Charles L. Finance and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Demonstrates the structure and function of the heart. Shows operation procedures to correct certain cardio vascular defects and mentions heart transplants. Includes a view of the mitral valves in living heart.
